About

Meet Leanna

Leanna Szypowski is a grade 11 student, currently attending MITT. She is working toward receiving the Software Development diploma at Manitoba Institute of Trades and Technology. She loves creating websites, from designing them to creating the code behind it all. While her skills are fairly new, Leanna wants to learn more about development.

Leanna has a huge passion for reading, writing, programming, and drawing. She spends most of her type trying to learn new things. She greatly enjoys math and english, loving the creativity and problem solving aspects of both. She also finds that programming is both logical and creative, making it one of her favourite things to do.
